    #include<iostream>
    #include<cstdio>
    #include<math.h>
    using namespace std;
    int main()
    {
    	int t;
    	cin>>t;
    	while(t--){
    	int n,i,j;
    	double sum=0;
    	cin>>n;
    	int a[n],b[n];
    	for(i=0;i<n;i++){
    	cin>>a[i];
    	}
    	for(i=0;i<n;i++){
    	cin>>b[i];
    	}
    	for(i=0;i<n;i++){
    	if(i==(n-1)){
    	j=0;
    	}
    	else j=i+1;
        sum+=(a[i]*b[j])-(b[i]*a[j]);
    	}
    	sum=sum/2;
    	if(sum<0){
    	sum=-sum;
    	}
        printf("%f \n",sum);
    	}
    	return 0;
    }
